thread.title: NTN Buzztime, Inc. to Discuss Fourth-Quarter and Full-Year 2017 Financial Results on March 6, 2018

author: cnbc.com
title: NTN Buzztime, Inc. to Discuss Fourth-Quarter and Full-Year 2017 Financial Results on March 6, 2018
text:
CARLSBAD, Calif., Feb. 20, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- NTN Buzztime, Inc. (NYSE American: NTN), announced it will conduct a conference call to discuss its financial results for the fourth-quarter and full-year ended December 31, 2017 at 4:30 P.M. ET on Tuesday, March 6, 2018.
CEO Ram Krishnan and CFO Allen Wolff will host the call and conduct a live question and answer session.
To access the conference call, please dial (877) 307-1373, if calling from the United States or Canada, or (678) 224-7873, if calling internationally, and use passcode 8955939.
A replay of the call will be available until March 13, 2018, which can be accessed by dialing (855) 859-2056, if calling from the United States or Canada, or (404) 537-3406, if calling internationally. Please use passcode 8955939 to access the replay.
The call will also be accompanied live by webcast over the Internet and accessible at the Company's Web site at http://www.buzztime.com .
About Buzztime
Buzztime (NYSE American: NTN) delivers interactive entertainment and innovative dining technology to bars and restaurants in North America. Venues license Buzztime's customizable solution to differentiate themselves via competitive fun by offering guests trivia, card, sports and arcade games, nationwide competitions, personalized menus and self-service dining features. Buzztime's platform improves operating efficiencies, creates connections among the players and venues, and amplifies guests' positive experiences. Founded in 1984, Buzztime has accumulated over 9 million player registrations and over 136 million games were played in 2016 alone. For more information, please visit http://www.buzztime.com or follow us on Facebook or Twitter @buzztime.
